Status Saver Status Saver For WhatsApp Status Read and agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to continue. Browse the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy Agree Version %1s Settings About Privacy Policy Feedback Disclaimer Hello blank fragment Close Are you sure to exit the application? Saved Status Direct Chat How to use? Whatsapp Whatsapp Business Click this below button and Allow permission to access your status Allow storage access Save Share Delete Repost No images are found yet! Direct Chat Enter your phone number Enter your message Send How to use? Step 1 Open WhatsApp app. Step 2 Watch your WhatsApp contact\'s status updates. Step 3 Come back to Status Saver for WhatsApp app, and all the viewed statuses will be displayed. Step 4 Click on download button or icon for save any status that you want. Step 5 You can also share the saved status on other social media platforms. Rate us Privacy Policy I take your privacy very seriously. Read You does not collect any user data, and all sensitive information (passwords and other account information) is securely stored in the local application database on your device. Read You will use the following permissions to provide you with the service. - Access Network permission (for accessing online content as you specify) - Get network status permission (for getting whether the device currently has available network conditions) - Background service permission (to automatically sync your favorites for you on a regular basis) Third Party Services This policy does not apply to third-party services that you use with Read You. You can review the privacy policies of the third-party services you use on their websites Disclaimers Read You is a content collection tool only. Your use of Read You is subject to the laws and regulations of your country and region, and any liability arising from your actions will be borne by you personally. Open Source License Read You is an open source project under the GNU GPL 3.0 Open Source License[1], which allows you to use, reference, and modify the source code of Read You for free, but does not allow the modified and derived code to be distributed and sold as closed-source commercial software. For details, please see the full GNU GPL 3.0 Open Source License[2]. Without these permissions, the app will not be able to access and modify the necessary data.\n\u25CF Click on the go to settings button.\n\u25CF It takes to the application details settings page.\n\u25CF Then click on the permission and allow the storage permission.\n Go to Settings Got it Ad EB46671689549F162FD792D653349B04 Language Select Language Cancel Changing language... OK Choose App Send Feedback Dear Team,\n\n

Status Saver is not partnered with WhatsApp in any way. It is just a tool to save the WhatsApp Status.

We don\'t own the copyrights of any Status. So please download or use Status for commercial purposes by taking respective owner\'s permission.

Status Saver is an easy-to-use mobile application that allows users to download and save WhatsApp statuses such as images, videos, and GIFs.\n\nhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=%1$s e Hari Moradiya Made in India with ❤️
